data.name: VYNK CHAIN
data.description:
About VYNK CHAIN
What Is VYNK CHIAN (VYNC)?
VYNK CHAIN is a delegated proof-of-stake token developed in tron and ethereum blockchain. VYNK CHAIN is a decentralized finance protocol that allows people to stake, lend and borrow crypto and also we aim to cover almost everything related to the E-commerce industry.
Stakers earn rewards by depositing digital assets into the VYNC ecosystem. VYNC provides holders with discounted prices on all our portals like VynkPay(affiliate marketing company), VYNK STORES(e-commerce company), VYNK SAFAR(travel portal), and VYNK SAFE (Decentralized Crypto wallet, Not live yet)
Who Are the Founders of VYNK CHAIN?
VYNK CHAIN was founded by Meeravali Shaik & Ravikumar Reddy M, who are the founders of VynkPay affiliate marketing company which has a presence in over 40+ countries.
As well as being entrepreneurs both got involved in cryptocurrency trading back in 2016. Ravikumar Reddy M is a developer since 2001 and Meeravali Shaik is a Self Employed and Management graduate. 
What Makes VYNK CHAIN Unique?
VYNC has some unique selling points when compared with competitors. VYNK CHAIN is a combination of Defi and utility token which is developed for both traders and the e-commerce industry. It has a simplified version of the ever-expanding Defi space for investors who are not technically minded or who wish to interact in a less committal manner than serious traders.
Related Portals :
https://vynkpay.app
https://vynkstores.com
https://vynksafar.com
How Many VYNK CHAIN (VYNC) Coins Are There in Circulation?

There is a maximum supply of 99 Million — but at the time of writing, there was a circulating supply of about 50 Million. Three rounds of Private sale of VYNC tokens were held between December  2020 and June 2021.
Approximately 20 Million was allotted to the development team once the token launched. Meanwhile, an additional 25 Million was held in reserve.
